testcase.classname: Validate the create post functionality of RealWorld application
testcase.name: validate the create post functionality
testcase.system-out: Given Sending the signin post request with "email" and "password"...........passed And Get token from signin response..........................................passed And Sending the create post payload with token..............................passed When create a new post with post request....................................passed Then Should get proper create post response.................................passed And Create Post Status code should be 200...................................passed
